entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
